item.title: Week One
item.description:
,

Week One

,

Writing our own Tools for Titans of Kansas City.

,

See the Group Here

,

What better way to go mainstream than starting somewhere attached to TIm Ferriss followers.

,

IF it wasn‚Äôt for the 4HWW and his online databases of knowledge, I‚Äôd be lacking a lot of indeed needed curiosities to fill up my time. Some say hobby, but experimenting is in the cards for me.

,

So in honor of that, here‚Äôs where I‚Äôll start my mandate of gratitude: curating a collection of titans in my own life. No matter how big or small, young or old, if these men & women capture my attention in an upstanding way, I‚Äôll cultivate some empty space and spend my time sharing the stories that unfold.

item.title: An important concept I hope my audience understands is that I'm not a creator by typical definition. I'm documenting my lifestyle and these guys and the lifestyle they promote is what I love showing you guys. This statement is fun for anyone trying to start something for the first time. Document what your doing, and leverage what you discover later. It doesn't have to be pretty just valuable. Cheers. . . . . @bentonmunyan @ryanmilesmunyan @heliofoodcompany @thinkbigcoworking @thinkgrowprosper @garyvee @davidrock @impactbillions @keto_adapted @ketogenicdietph @hatchpad @entrepreneur @foundr @gerardadams @russellbrunson @tonyrobbins @bulletproof @tylerbabin . . . . #vaynertalent #fatadaptive #kansascity #entrepreneur #entrepreneurlife #podcast #panel #heliofoodcompany #helio #twins

item.title: Sailing Holidays in Croatia
item.description:
Sailing Holidays in Croatia

Sail Croatia for 7 days on our festive route. Explore Hvar, Split and other islands every day as well as our famous floating day parties. A summer you'll never forget.

item.title: Quarter Deck | Skipper Academy
item.description:
Quarter Deck | Skipper Academy

The Quarter Deck is a school offering courses to prepare experienced sailors to become professional skippers and work with The Yacht Week or Yachts and Friends.

THE WIM HOF METHOD: PHYSICAL TRAINING THAT CHANGED MY LIFE.
item.description:
THE WIM HOF METHOD: PHYSICAL TRAINING THAT CHANGED MY LIFE.

,

‚ÄúI feel stronger from within. I feel like I've learned how to train the tiny muscles surrounding my capillaries. I know that sounds strange. You'll have to feel it to understand it, I think.‚Äù
